text: usee (allaah) ko pukaarana saty hai aur jo usake siva doosaron ko pukaarate hain, ve unakee praarthana kuchh nahin sunate. jaise koee apanee donon hatheliyaan jal kee or phailaaya hua ho, taaki usake munh mein pahunch jaaye, jabaki vah usatak pahunchane vaala nahin aur kaafiron kee pukaar vyarth (nishphal) hee hai
